code: @Test public void testTransactionSuccess() throws Exception {     // START SNIPPET: e1     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedMessageCount(1).     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("Bye World").     // success at 3rd attempt     mock.message(0).header("count").isEqualTo(3).     template.sendBody("activemq:queue:okay", "Hello World").     mock.assertIsSatisfied(). // END SNIPPET: e1 }

public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     if (++count <= 2) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Forced Exception number " + count + ", please retry").     }     exchange.getIn().setBody("Bye World").     exchange.getIn().setHeader("count", count). }
